concludeQuestions.improve: Add sand grain size as a third variable

consistent-reason.value: I chose three because triplicate samples is the minimum required to characterize variability. If I knew more about sand dune variability, I might choose more replicates if the sand tends to be highly heterogeneous at a particular location on the slope.

evenly-space-reason.value: To visualize the trend across the entire slope

familiarity.value: I am not familiar with any features
